pages.text: $(li)The Gunpowder is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:utility/charm/block_of_gunpowder)Gunpowder Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/gunpowder_sack)Gunpowder Sacks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charges$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/spring_launcher)Spring Launcher$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/firework)Firework Rocket$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt)TNT$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be used to convert a regular Potion into a Splash Potion in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l) too.

$(li)The Gunpowder can be obtained in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) in the $(l)Dungeons$(), $(l:patchouli:structures/desert_temple)Desert Temples$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/mansion)Mansions$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:structures/shipwreck)Shipwrecks$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/creeper)Creepers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/ghast)Ghasts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/goblins_and_dungeons/goom)Gooms$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/griefer)Griefers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
